title: Are You Ready for Some Gambling, Chip Cycle Weakening, Inside White House Chaos
itunes:title: Are You Ready for Some Gambling, Chip Cycle Weakening, Inside White House Chaos
description:
Jay Masurekar, Head of Gaming at KeyBanc Capital Markets, talks about the impact of legal sports betting as football season begins. Anand Srinivasan, Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Semiconductor Analyst, discusses a drop in chips over concerns with Micron and related memory markets. Joshua Green,Bloomberg Businessweek National Correspondent; explains President Trump’s reaction to the NY Times "resistance" story. Mark Leibovich, Chief National Correspondent for New York Times Magazine, talks about his book "Big Game: The NFL in Dangerous Times" And we Drive to the Close of the market with John Traynor, Chief Investment Officer at People's United Advisors. 

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
